DOC.brief_summary: Non inferiority , multicentric , double blind study whose primary objective compare effectiveness two product pain reduction . Primary endpoint : reduction pain average day 7 compare day 1 ( baseline ) , use Analogue Visual Scale ( AVS ) pain evaluation . Secondary endpoint : evaluate product safety gastrointestinal system .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study Between Lysine Clonixinate+Cyclobenzaprine Caffeine+Carisoprodol+Sodium Diclofenac+Paracetamol
DOC.detailed_description: Phase IIIb , non-inferiority , multicentric , double-blind study.Population : 160 patient , 80 study arm , gender mild moderate lumbago , without irradiation muscle contraction , age 18 ( eighteen ) 65 ( sixty five ) year , without previous history stomach duodenal ulcer gastritis .
